rassige awwa wati jala thalaya dipthimathwa babaladdi eka matha eka nangemin hapemin ena sihin jala rekha kadolana gas mul atharin githawath handak nangamin peri pena pindu nanwayi.kolambaa nagaraye rathwunu godanangili thula dinapatha gewana karyala jiwitha samanga sansandanaya karaddi mewan wu parisarayaka athi suwaya thawa thawath apa ema chamathkarayata loba karanu walakwiya hakida?gangata wiwrutha idiwunu niwesabolgoda gan iwure pihiti gatha sitha niwa sanahalana me sonduru parisaraya jiwithaya windanaya karamin gatha karannata karana aaradhanaya kese nam bahara karannada?kawiyakuta mewan wu parisarayakadi aneka widha wichitha්ra kawi sithiwili pahala wanu nisaka ya.lekhakayakuta mewan wu nihandathawayakadi apa්ramana nirmanashili adahas gala enu sahathikaya.gatha sitha widabara wu ayakuta me hama ena ek sisil sulan rallak ee siyalla palawa harinnata wuna pa්ramanawath ya.sabawin ma me chamathkara janaka neth sith washi karawana parisaraye himikaru pol ruppawa madin wati athi simenthi adipara dige semen awida enu pene.ohu atha randi pothaki.basa yana hiruge awasan ras daharin parisaraya thawamath eliya wi atha.wiwrutha aalindayasemen awida gos, ganthiraya sipagena ena sulangata muhuna di ehi athi putuwaka wadiwunu ohu pothata neth yoma gani.asannata dahasak de atha.
